meanings.definition: Full of life and energy; lively
meanings.sent1: The puppy was the sprightliest in the litter, always bouncing around with joy.
meanings.sent2: The children played tag in the park, with the sprightliest one leading the game.
meanings.sent3: The sprightliest squirrel in the forest could never sit still, always chasing after acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the sprightliest melody in the room, filling it with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sprightliest flowers in the garden danced in the breeze, their colors vibrant and cheerful.
